parameters.jsCode:
const rssUrls = [
  "https://antyweb.pl/feed/", // Poprawiony URL
  "https://blog.justjoin.it/tag/sztuczna-inteligencja/feed",
  "https://sztucznainteligencja.org.pl/feed",
  "https://www.chip.pl/kategoria/sztuczna-inteligencja/feed",
  "https://www.dobreprogramy.pl/tagi/ai,news,rss",
  "https://zaufanatrzeciastrona.pl/feed/",
  "https://linux.pl/feed/",
  "https://ai.googleblog.com/feeds/posts/default",
  "https://openai.com/blog/rss.xml",
  "https://www.anthropic.com/news.xml",
  "https://www.technologyreview.com/feed/tag/artificial-intelligence/",
  "https://www.theverge.com/rss/ai-artificial-intelligence/index.xml",
  "https://huggingface.co/blog/feed.xml",
  "https://machinelearningmastery.com/feed/",
  "https://blogs.nvidia.com/blog/category/artificial-intelligence/feed/",
  "https://feeds.feedburner.com/TheHackerNews",
  "https://www.bleepingcomputer.com/feed/",
  "https://www.darkreading.com/rss_simple.asp",
  "https://www.hashicorp.com/blog/feed.xml",
  "https://www.servethehome.com/feed/"
];

const uniqueUrls = [...new Set(rssUrls)];
return uniqueUrls.map(url => ({ url: url }));
